snippet.title: Aerostrike Gameplay - Factory Run
snippet.description:
Trying out some new recording software that doesn't block the game's Radar. Sound feels a little compressed, I'll have to play with the settings.

I also decided to try and record a full Factory Run on Trial by Fire difficulty. The Factory Run is a specific segment of Chapter 2, composed of 3 separate battles.

While you can backtrack to a Dock between each fight, you can also push through all 3 in one go. This video attempts the latter.

You can download the free demo of Aerostrike, or purchase the full game here: https://lmg3864.itch.io/aerostrike
